name: Ludum Dare 38 - Contamination
description:
A scientist is looking at an experiment, but unfortunately he has a cold and keeps sneezing and coughing into the petri dish. This is adding germs to the experiment.

You control a blue cell that can shoot the red germs before they infect the green cells.

  • Good cells will split, as good cells do!
  • Germs will attack good cells... and they can attack you!

Controls:

  • WASD to move in 8 directions
  • Up/Down/Left/Right arrows (or I/J/K/L on keyboard) to shoot in 8 directions
  • Spacebar to use Super Cell (if you have one!)

This is my Ludum Dare 38 submission, and I believe my first 3D game. I would be interested in your comments and also your high score!
